string-array.item: This basic app will be available free, always. It may become ad supported at some point in the future, but I have no plans for that at this time. I made this app for myself, my friends, and for the Dota 2 community as a whole. I want everyone to use it!

You may be wondering why Charlton Heston is sprinkled throughout the app. No, it is not a joke. Many people only remember him for his gun rights advocacy in his later years, which is a shame because he was in some really great movies. If putting Charles in this app gets just one person to watch Ben-Hur or Planet of the Apes, then I think it is worth it.
I want Charlton Heston to be your Dota 2 Best Friend. Constructive feedback is welcome!
